entities.name: george
entities.description: George is a person who is part of Harry's group and is discussing the weapon with Ron and Fred. He says 'That's where he hid the Sorcerer's Stone!' referring to Hogwarts.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is part of Harry's group and is discussing the weapon with George and Fred. He sounds slightly nervous when saying 'I hope it's our side'.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is a person who is part of Harry's group and is discussing the weapon with Ron and George. He says 'Dumbledore's probably keeping it'.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who is mentioned by Fred as possibly keeping the weapon. He is also mentioned as hiding the Sorcerer's Stone in Hogwarts.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is part of the group and is discussing the weapon with Ron, George, and Fred. He asks 'What d'you mean?' when referring to Ginny's Bat-Bogey Hexes.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a person who is mentioned by George as being able to cast powerful spells, specifically the Bat-Bogey Hexes.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a location where Dumbledore hid the Sorcerer's Stone and possibly keeping the weapon. It is also mentioned as a possible place for the weapon to be kept.

entities.name: sorcerer's stone
entities.description: The Sorcerer's Stone is an object that was hidden by Dumbledore in Hogwarts.

entities.name: bat-bogey hexes
entities.description: Bat-Bogey Hexes are spells cast by Ginny that can be powerful despite their size.
